channel.title: fuse on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in fuse on Will Schenk

item.title: IPFS and Fuse
item.description: IPFS is cool. It’s a peer to peer distributed file system, or graph database, where you reference the data by its hash. This has the great property that the data is no longer tied to a particular computer or server. It can be spread around and you can get it from anybody without worrying if they’ve changed or alterted it in any way. If you know what you are looking for, you don’t need to worry about who you get it from.
